meanings.definition: The matter from which a thing is or can be made.
meanings.sent1: The builder used various materials to construct the house.
meanings.sent2: The artist gathered colorful materials to create a beautiful painting.
meanings.sent3: The materials for the project magically disappeared overnight!
meanings.sent4: Her kindness and patience were the materials of her success.
meanings.sent5: The teacher brought in materials to make the lesson more engaging.

meanings.definition: Information or ideas for use in creating a book, speech, etc.
meanings.sent1: The author researched materials for his new novel.
meanings.sent2: The student found helpful materials for his presentation at the library.
meanings.sent3: The materials for the speech were scattered all over the desk.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a treasure trove of materials for storytelling.
meanings.sent5: The internet is a vast source of materials for research projects.
